text: O visvasulara! Mi banisalu mariyu yuktavayas'suku cerani mi pillalu, mudu samayalalo anumati tisukone mi vaddaku ravali. (Avi) udayapu (phajr) namaj ku mundu, madhyahnam (juhr) taruvata - miru mi vastralu vidici unnappudu - mariyu ratri (isa) namaj taruvata. I mudu, mi koraku ekanta (parada) samayalu. Viti taruvata varu mariyu miru okari vaddaku marokaru vacci potu vunte, varipai gani, mipai gani elanti dosam ledu. I vidhanga allah miku tana ajnalanu visadikaristunnadu. Allah sarvajnudu, maha vivekavantudu
